description.narrative: Overall, the project will contribute to the knowledge and capacity development of the South African National Prosecuting Agency. The project activities will set the foundation for its future actions in order to achieve the results set out in their Medium Term Strategic Framework and Annual Performance Plans. More specifically, the project will support the NPA have a better understanding of the services needed by victims of crime and will have an increased understanding of how to effect structural, operational and behavioural change within the organisation.

mailing-address.narrative: iParioli Office Park, Block B2, Ground Floor, 1166 Park Street, Hatfield

description.narrative: FL §06.38.02.18 Strategic activities in growth economies

title.narrative: The National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) will have an increased understanding of how to effect structural, operational and behavioural change.
Consultations and research reports on the mechanism to effect structural, operational and behavioural change in the NPA.

target.value: Consultations and research reports on the mechanism to effect structural, operational and behavioural change in the NPA.

actual.value: Research report and operational guidelines are now available to the NPA. This includes: 1. Consultations and reserch reports available to NPA senior managers and staff to utilise for implemntation of change in the institution. 2.Cannot assess long-term change management as yet, further training will be arranged for implementation assessment. 3. Outcomes appropriate for the current period and phase of development of the NPA. 4. The products produced are important as they create a pathway for change to be instituted in the NPA. While in thsi case, this applies to victim-centred services; these lessons can be applied to other change processes within the NPA, adding greater value. 5. The project outcomes have sustainability.

title.narrative: The project outputs will contribute to a better understanding in the National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) of the services needed by victims, from the perspective of victims.
Consultations and research reports an drelated products are produced for various NPA audiences.

target.value: Consultations and research reports and related products are produced for various NPA audiences.

actual.value: The NPA Task Team confirmed that the new information provided in reports is sufficient to contirbute to its strategic objectives. This includes: 1. A full research report is available (for decision-makers), a summary report and an infographics chart are available for other audiences within the NPA. Comments and feedback from the NPA have been integrated into the final reports. 2. No significant changes in planned outputs occurred. 3. The partners and modalities of the project were deemed appropriate and implementation results can only be assessed later into 2021. This assessment is not part of the current project. 4. The project outputs contribution will still be assessed long-term. In particular, there is value-added to the NPA's work on South African public and crime victims. 5. There are greater prospects for sustainability of the outputs and overall outcomes of the project.
